about_the_game:
FINDER is a first-person stealth where player has to escape from an ancient abandoned Сity. Use the map and find your way to the heart of the City and unravel its mysteries.


You are the Finder. Arriving in the Cradle you begin a long journey to the legendary Tower of the Philosophers. But all that remains of the great city are half-abandoned city ruins where strange things begin to happen. The few locals are hiding in their homes for fear of the wandering Ghosts. The Cradle is in decline and the town has become like a veritable labyrinth. An old map helps but it's not perfect. Many roads have come and gone since its creation, and you have to draw them yourself.


  • A hand-crafted city with free exploration - from an abandoned cemetery to a maze of sewers. You choose your own routes and paths to explore this mysterious city.
  • There are Ghosts patrolling the streets that can catch you if you don't watch their movements.
  • The interactive map that shows the location of the Ghosts. You can use the map to draw routes and avoid the Ghosts.
  • Help the locals to learn more information about the city, secret paths and get closer to unraveling city secrets.
  • 5-7 hours of gameplay.

short_description: Finder receives an invitation to the Cradle from the lords of that ancient city. Use the map and unravel all the secrets of the mysterious labyrinthine, haunted city to find the only true path to the Philosophers Tower!
